entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16 except minus 11 south of Hare Bay. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness then 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 16 except minus 11 south of Hare Bay. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 20 except minus 14 south of Hare Bay.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 20 except minus 14 south of Hare Bay. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 12 February 2023
